name: Emergency Exit (Bman112)
description:
You wake up in the middle of the night and realize that your house is on fire. Can you make it out in time? 

Explore the house and find the best way out

The game is created for the VimJam 3. 

Themes:
- Multi-use: The bar at the top of the screen is shared for both your health and energy for attacks 
- Turn up the heat: well, your house is on fire 

This is the first game jam I have every participated in, so I am very excited to share the result. and I hope that you have fun playing it

Hint:
There are multiple ways to complete this game and exit the house. Some of them includes brute forcing through the fire, others include taking the long way around, and finally some are a combination of all
